wikipedia_page.main: Sharon Tregenza (née Rosewall) is a British author of children's books, stories and verse. She was born and grew up in Penzance, Cornwall. Her work, often described as mystery with a touch of magic, has been published and broadcast worldwide. She is represented by Rebecca Bagnell at the Lindsay Literary Agency

response: *Sharon Tregenza (born 1951) – Tarantula Tide, The Shiver Stone
